title: If Riot Rereleases Championship Riven, I Am Completely Done With Respecting This Company
body:
you can lie and fuck over your customers and gamers multiple times. but when it comes to skins you know were labeled as limited and sold online as a very rare accessory, there are boundaries.

i know after dq you started not giving 2 shits about what anyone cares about your company, but as someone who has been fucked by every decision u have made, champ riven being released again would 2 fold it all.

idc that i spent money to get that skin(big money) its the fact that you're doing it primarliy for money. if you actually cared about what the people who wanted the skin again wanted, you would release a skin similar to it. but instead you're just going out and releasing the original skin. idc about compensation. i bought the skin to let others know i was there when it came out. if you release champ riven, release every other skin that isnt pax. dont fuck me over then wait a while till you fuck the other skin owners over.

no compensation is enough for another betrayal from a fucking game company that has no respect or honesty in itself. its just a big cash grab that you use regardless of the original sale.

sincerely - a filthy riven main with every single riven skin on his main. (champ riven included) (riot pls just this once lemme get what i want )

replies.body: I feel ya bro, i was just as pissed when they released striker ezreal again, after promising to not ever release them again. Congrats on getting that boarder in the loading screen, feels super good to own the skin.

>idc that i spent money to get that skin(big money)

what did you spend 300 for a skin code? If yes i personally do not think that you should have the skin anyways.
thanks for the input thanks come again. i paid for the skin on my other acc in the store and bought a skin code on my main
then it was not big money then, was it? It was a 975 skin
and 300 for my main. its still a limited skin that was told to be limited the season it came out.
Why the hell did you spend 300$ on a skin?

I really don't get why everyone hates that riot wants to make money. At the end of the day Riot Games is a business or a company that needs monetary influence to survive and keep the League of Legends FREE. I am very sure none of you would want our game to become (Pay-To-Play). Another thing all skins are purely cosmetic, nothing more than pretty pixels. Now if you wish to spend you're money on them that is you're sole choice, yes we know some skins should stay legacy but what if someone new would like to buy that particular? Then Riot seeing that a large group of players would like to buy that skin, they would release it for a short period of time, so that players would get a chance to get it and bring in profits.

They are giving something for those that got it originally they are selling it again because the game grew dramatically during season 3 and 4 but you could not get CS riven after season 2 so its unfair to the new players that they could never get the skin and it is not their fault either.

and it isnt my fault either. release a similar skin. dont release the original thing. its not fair to the skin owners . i would kill for pax tf and sivir, but u dont see me saying it should be in my collection cuz i started playing the game yesterday? it makes no sense.

the compensation will most likely be some garbage icon that no one cares about. i paid big money and yet again idc about the money but the point still stands. its not fair.

ik someones gonna come tell me riot can do what they want, but lying shouldnt be one of them.

It wasn't really a lie though.  They likely had the full intention of never re-releasing her, but the game did grow dramatically afterwards.

What do you even lose from the re-release?  The icon or whatever they give you will give all the proof you need that you've been playing since S2 and bought the skin back then.  The skin will still look just as good.

kk lemme sell u my limited edition watch that i made for 1k saying its not coming out again at that time. after a few years im gonna change my mind and make 4 more and sell em for 100 dollars. hopefully you're fine with that

Are they changing the price for it?  Did you actually spend much money on it?

Also, how many people even wear watches nowadays?

there are skins that they wont release again such as king rammus or the pax skins but why the hell would one CS skin be limited and the others not be people who own it from the start will get a little something something dont worry

They already did this with other skins such as the World Cup 2010 skins and the original Harrowing, which at the time were said to never be available again. When they introduced the legacy concept and made them available again, I got refunded the RP, received the special summoner icon, and my skins have a watermark on the splashes to indicate that they're old school. Probably the best you're gonna get, it's cool to be special I guess, but not sure it's worth flipping out over artificially rare bits of cosmetics for video game character *shrug*
Good news for you, they said that they are planning to release it in the next Worlds.
